item.title: What if my smart home helps me remember all the small things I always forget?
item.description:
After years of reading productivity books and building automations in Home Assistant, Iâ€™m on the verge of putting my knowledge and skills to work for the ultimate smart assistant. My goal? To never forget groceries again and to keep challenging myself, inspired by The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People by Stephen Covey.

In this blog, I will take you along on my journey: from the very first installation of Proxmox and all applications to who knows where this adventure will lead me. I hope to live not only smarter but also better.
